對自己要有信心

加油
大陸的同學也需要導遊

Even though “practice makes perfect”, you still need to learn first or you are not speaking English rather you just typed down English vocabulary in Chinese grammar.

Followings are some feedbacks for your autograph.

I speak some English, and I am a foodie who also enjoys traveling a lot. I’d love to hang out with people from overseas for not only language exchange but cultural exposure so that someday in the future I might be able to live in a foreign land.

Purely grammatical corrections on your original essay as listed.

I can say a little bit of English.
Just “I speak a bit English” is good enough.

I like tasting foodS, and travelING.
A foodie is someone who enjoys good foods a lot. Tasting foods don’t make any sense in English.

If foreigners don’t mind, I want to be your LOCAL guide, AND take you to travel IN Taiwan.
This sentence is literally Chinese English that you only typed down vocabularies without much English grammar.

(As to why do that, because) THE REASON WHY I AM DOING THIS IS THAT I want to practice English, and (no strangers to foreigners.) be familiar with your cultures.

Because later wanted to live abroad
I am dreaming to live in abroad someday so

Want to practice it AND LEARN how to get along with foreigners.

到最後是用估狗翻譯直接貼上嗎？加油啊！
